mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Animal (sexCd, noticeNo, kindCd, careAddr, processState , noticeSdt, noticeEdt, weight, careNm, desertionNo , careTel, happenPlace, officetel, orgNm, popfile , neuterYn,specialMark,colorCd,happenDt, age) VALUES(#{sexCd}, #{noticeNo}, #{kindCd}, #{careAddr}, #{processState}, #{noticeSdt}, #{noticeEdt}, #{weight} ,#{careNm}, #{desertionNo}, #{careTel}, #{happenPlace}, #{officetel}, #{orgNm}, #{popfile},#{neuterYn}, #{specialMark}, #{colorCd}, #{happenDt}, #{age})
